Trigger A creature within your reach damages you with a melee attack.

Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm. Attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] the triggering creature or to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] the creature of the weapon it damaged you with.
